languages.text: "Едва ли, но могу дать краткую сводку: как и другие писари, Кварт был отобран лично префектом для ведения учета десятины. Он дотошен, исполнителен и невероятно предан делу. Я видела его несколько раз — он всегда был с головой погружен в работу". {n}Йегер чуть хмурится.{/n} "Я бы даже сказала, поглощен ею без остатка".

"Hardly, but I can give a brief resume. Like other scribes, Quart was personally selected by the prefect to maintain the inventory. He is meticulous, efficient, and incredibly committed. I saw him on several occasions, and he was always immersed in his work." {n}Yeager frowns slightly.{/n} "Perhaps even obsessively so."
languages.original_text: "Едва ли, но могу дать краткую сводку: как и другие писари, Кварт был отобран лично префектом для ведения учета десятины. Он дотошен, исполнителен и невероятно предан делу. Я видела его несколько раз — он всегда был с головой погружен в работу". {n}Йегер чуть хмурится.{/n} "Я бы даже сказала, поглощен ею без остатка".

He is meticulous, efficient, and incredibly committed. I saw him on several occasions, and he was always immersed in his work." {n}Yeager frowns slightly.{/n} "Perhaps even obsessively so."

I saw him on several occasions, and he was always immersed in his work." {n}Yeager frowns slightly.{/n} "Perhaps even obsessively so."

"Hardly, but I can give a brief resume. Like other scribes, Quart was personally selected by the prefect to maintain the inventory. He is meticulous, efficient, and incredibly committed. I saw him on several occasions, and he was always immersed in his work." {n}Yeager frowns slightly.{/n} "Perhaps even obsessively so."

languages.text: "Schwerlich, aber ich kann Euch einen kurzen Überblick geben. Wie andere Schreiber wurde Quart von der Präfektin persönlich für die Pflege des Inventars ausgewählt. Er ist akribisch, effizient und unglaublich engagiert. Ich habe ihn mehrmals getroffen, und er war stets in seine Arbeit vertieft." {n}Yeager runzelt leicht dir Stirn.{/n} "Vielleicht sogar obsessiv."
languages.original_text: "Hardly, but I can give a brief resume. Like other scribes, Quart was personally selected by the prefect to maintain the inventory. He is meticulous, efficient, and incredibly committed. I saw him on several occasions, and he was always immersed in his work." {n}Yeager frowns slightly.{/n} "Perhaps even obsessively so."

traits.locale_text: "Schwerlich, aber ich kann Euch einen kurzen Überblick geben. Wie andere Schreiber wurde Quart von der Präfektin persönlich für die Pflege des Inventars ausgewählt. Er ist akribisch, effizient und unglaublich engagiert. Ich habe ihn mehrmals getroffen, und er war stets in seine Arbeit vertieft." {n}Yeager runzelt leicht dir Stirn.{/n} "Vielleicht sogar obsessiv."

languages.text: « Pas vraiment, mais je peux vous en donner une description rapide. Comme d'autres scribes, Quart a été sélectionné par la préfète en personne pour s'occuper de l'inventaire. Il est méticuleux, efficace et incroyablement dévoué. Chaque fois que j'ai eu l'occasion de le voir, il était toujours absorbé par son travail. J'irais même jusqu'à dire que son zèle frise l'obsession, » {n}termine Yeager en fronçant légèrement les sourcils.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hardly, but I can give a brief resume. Like other scribes, Quart was personally selected by the prefect to maintain the inventory. He is meticulous, efficient, and incredibly committed. I saw him on several occasions, and he was always immersed in his work." {n}Yeager frowns slightly.{/n} "Perhaps even obsessively so."

traits.locale_text: « Pas vraiment, mais je peux vous en donner une description rapide. Comme d'autres scribes, Quart a été sélectionné par la préfète en personne pour s'occuper de l'inventaire. Il est méticuleux, efficace et incroyablement dévoué. Chaque fois que j'ai eu l'occasion de le voir, il était toujours absorbé par son travail. J'irais même jusqu'à dire que son zèle frise l'obsession, » {n}termine Yeager en fronçant légèrement les sourcils.{/n}

languages.text: “基本没有，不过我可以简单介绍一下这个人。夸特与其他人一样，是行政官本人亲自挑选的职员，负责统计什一税资源。他做事一丝不苟，很有效率，而且非常投入。我之前见过他几次，每次见到他，他都沉浸在工作之中。”{n}耶格尔微微皱了皱眉。{/n}“甚至可以说痴迷其中。”
languages.original_text: "Hardly, but I can give a brief resume. Like other scribes, Quart was personally selected by the prefect to maintain the inventory. He is meticulous, efficient, and incredibly committed. I saw him on several occasions, and he was always immersed in his work." {n}Yeager frowns slightly.{/n} "Perhaps even obsessively so."

traits.locale_text: “基本没有，不过我可以简单介绍一下这个人。夸特与其他人一样，是行政官本人亲自挑选的职员，负责统计什一税资源。他做事一丝不苟，很有效率，而且非常投入。我之前见过他几次，每次见到他，他都沉浸在工作之中。”{n}耶格尔微微皱了皱眉。{/n}“甚至可以说痴迷其中。”

languages.text: «No, pero puedo ofrecerle un resumen rápido. Como los demás escribas, Quart fue seleccionado personalmente por la prefecta para mantener el inventario. Es meticuloso, eficiente y extremadamente dedicado. Le he visto en varias ocasiones, siempre enfrascado en su trabajo». {n}Yeager frunce el ceño levemente.{/n} «Quizá incluso de forma obsesiva».
languages.original_text: "Hardly, but I can give a brief resume. Like other scribes, Quart was personally selected by the prefect to maintain the inventory. He is meticulous, efficient, and incredibly committed. I saw him on several occasions, and he was always immersed in his work." {n}Yeager frowns slightly.{/n} "Perhaps even obsessively so."

traits.locale_text: «No, pero puedo ofrecerle un resumen rápido. Como los demás escribas, Quart fue seleccionado personalmente por la prefecta para mantener el inventario. Es meticuloso, eficiente y extremadamente dedicado. Le he visto en varias ocasiones, siempre enfrascado en su trabajo». {n}Yeager frunce el ceño levemente.{/n} «Quizá incluso de forma obsesiva».

languages.text: 「そうでもありませんが、簡単に経歴を説明することはできます。クアートは他の書記と同様に、インベントリを管理するために総監によって直接任命された人物です。几帳面で有能、そして非常に献身的です。私も何度か彼を見かけましたが、いつも仕事に没頭していました」{n}イェーガーはわずかに眉をひそめた。{/n}「たぶん、取り憑かれていると言ってもいいくらいですね」
languages.original_text: "Hardly, but I can give a brief resume. Like other scribes, Quart was personally selected by the prefect to maintain the inventory. He is meticulous, efficient, and incredibly committed. I saw him on several occasions, and he was always immersed in his work." {n}Yeager frowns slightly.{/n} "Perhaps even obsessively so."

traits.locale_text: 「そうでもありませんが、簡単に経歴を説明することはできます。クアートは他の書記と同様に、インベントリを管理するために総監によって直接任命された人物です。几帳面で有能、そして非常に献身的です。私も何度か彼を見かけましたが、いつも仕事に没頭していました」{n}イェーガーはわずかに眉をひそめた。{/n}「たぶん、取り憑かれていると言ってもいいくらいですね」

languages.text: "Pek sanmıyorum, yine de kısa bir özet geçebilirim. Diğer kâtipler gibi Quart da envanter tutmak üzere bizzat prefekt tarafından seçildi. Titiz, verimli ve inanılmaz derecede kendini işine adamış biri. Kendisini birkaç kez gördüm, hep işinde gücündeydi." {n}Yeager hafifçe kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Hatta işine takıntılı olduğu söylenebilir."
languages.original_text: "Hardly, but I can give a brief resume. Like other scribes, Quart was personally selected by the prefect to maintain the inventory. He is meticulous, efficient, and incredibly committed. I saw him on several occasions, and he was always immersed in his work." {n}Yeager frowns slightly.{/n} "Perhaps even obsessively so."

traits.locale_text: "Pek sanmıyorum, yine de kısa bir özet geçebilirim. Diğer kâtipler gibi Quart da envanter tutmak üzere bizzat prefekt tarafından seçildi. Titiz, verimli ve inanılmaz derecede kendini işine adamış biri. Kendisini birkaç kez gördüm, hep işinde gücündeydi." {n}Yeager hafifçe kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Hatta işine takıntılı olduğu söylenebilir."
